title: 8: OBITCH it's a shit show...
description:
OBITCH it’s a shit show…
This week the gruesome twosome talk about some real shitty situations, like an execution technique called the boats, and the bowel-movement bandit from Akron, Ohio. Spencer starts us off with a look into the world of funeral strippers, and Madison shares some eery ways executions have been carried out. We’ve got an obituary for a real witch, and a sweet autobiographical one as well, and of course we’ve got some dumb.ass.criminalsssss! 
This week’s episode is sponsored by Betterhelp. Visit betterhelp.com/obit for 10% off your first month of online counseling. 
Follow along online: instagram.com/obitchuarypod 
Write to us: obitpod@gmail.com
Rate & Review on iTunes!

https://gizmodo.com/taiwans-funeral-strippers-dance-for-a-dead-crowd-5819625
https://www.huffingtonpost.ca/2015/03/12/bowel-movement-bandit-akron-poop-cars_n_6855606.html
Atlantic.com  https://www.theatlantic.com/magazine/archive/2015/06/a-brief-history-of-american-executions/392270/
https://www.crf-usa.org/images/pdf/HistoryoftheDeathPenaltyinAmerica.pdf#:~:text=In%20the%20American%20colonies%2C%20legal%20executions%20took%20place,prisons%20to%20eliminate%20the%20spectacle%20of%20public%20executions
